titleStmt.title: The copies of two speeches in Parliament The one by Iohn Glanvill Esquire. The other by Sir Henry Martin Knight. At a generall committee of both houses, the 22. of May. 1628.
titleStmt.author: Glanville, John, Sir, 1586-1661.
Martin, Henry, Sir, 1562?-1641. aut
England and Wales. Parliament. Proceedings. 1628-05-22.

notesStmt.note: "Sir Henry Martins speech" (caption title) has separate pagination and register; text commences "My Lords, the worke of this day ..". Variant: lacking this caption title. Certain parts of the text also show minor resetting.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
